episodes.title: Smoke Signal
episodes.plot: After barely surviving Eren's recovery, a rising threat from the shadows puts everyone's lives in danger again.

episodes.title: Pain
episodes.plot: The Scouts take a stand against a new enemy, but it's not just Titans they'll be fighting anymore.

episodes.title: Old Story
episodes.plot: Historia and Erwin look back on their past, revealing shady actions taken by the government and a motivation for change.

episodes.title: Trust
episodes.plot: On the run and running out of time, the Scouts must entrust their lives to others if they plan on surviving.

episodes.title: Reply
episodes.plot: Erwin pleads his case for the Scouts to be spared, but an unforeseen announcement puts the fate of humanity at risk.

episodes.title: Sin
episodes.plot: While sins of the past reveal new truths, both sides prepare for the upcoming showdown before they run out of time.

episodes.title: Wish
episodes.plot: As battle breaks out to prevent the ritual, Historia makes a shocking decision which leads to catastrophe.

episodes.title: Outside the Walls of Orvud District
episodes.plot: When everything falls apart, Eren must believe in himself to save his friends. But Eren alone may not be enough to stop the impending doom.

episodes.title: Ruler of the Walls
episodes.plot: Desperate to stop the approaching monstrosity, the Scouts resort to unconventional tactics before it destroys everything in its path.

episodes.title: Friends
episodes.plot: Kenny recalls the life which has brought him to death's door, but he gets to decide whether to live on or not.

episodes.title: Bystander
episodes.plot: Having seen a glimpse of his father's memories, Eren attempts to track down a man hoping they might shed some light on his father's secrets.

episodes.title: Night of the Battle to Retake the Wall
episodes.plot: The Scouts enjoy a feast before retaking Wall Maria. They'll soon uncover what's hidden within the basement, once and for all.

episodes.title: The Town Where Everything Began
episodes.plot: The operation to retake Wall Maria commences in Shiganshina, the town where everything began. But when the Scouts arrive, something seems very wrong.

episodes.title: Thunder Spears
episodes.plot: Against a rush of enemies, the Scouts scramble to defend their horses. But despite falling into a trap, they have their own surprise for the Armored Titan.

episodes.title: Descent
episodes.plot: Though their Thunder Spears prove effective, the Scouts' celebration is short-lived as disaster descends upon Shiganshina.

episodes.title: Perfect Game
episodes.plot: While one front is rained on by flames, the other is battered by boulders. With no way out and limited options, the Scouts are forced to fight against the Titans with little hope left.

episodes.title: Hero
episodes.plot: As Erwin's heroic charge buys Levi time to confront the Beast Titan, Armin comes up with a plan of his own that lays it all on the line.

episodes.title: Midnight Sun
episodes.plot: While picking up the pieces from the costly battle, tensions rise when deciding which of the wounded Scouts to use the single syringe on.

episodes.title: The Basement
episodes.plot: The secrets hidden in Grisha's basement await in the ruins of Shiganshina. There, the Scouts hope to find answers to the world worth more than the price they paid.

episodes.title: That Day
episodes.plot: A look into Grisha's memories shows Eren the many secrets his father was hiding, including one which led to his mother's demise.

episodes.title: Attack Titan
episodes.plot: Eren learns how all paths connect in the story that his father began. If Grisha is to pay for his sins, he must fight for freedom and take a stand.

episodes.title: The Other Side of the Wall
episodes.plot: Though it's met with hope and despair, the truth is made public. The Scouts then venture beyond the walls to see if it's everything they dreamed of.
